title: This scam came in my post
selftext:
I got this letter apparently from "meesho". And when i scratched the coupon that was inside, i won 11.5 lakhs😱.
The scammer even left the meesho whatsapp no to make it believeable😂. Anyways, have any of you received a letter like this?
comments: Man, one bs i caught was that Government Act 267A/B and section 121.....they just make up stuff so effortlessly without any brains!

Same man i also looked up what government act 267A/B Section 121A is   And it is totally out if context in here . 
S.267 (Whoever makes, sells or disposes of any instrument for weighing, or any weight, or any measure of length or capacity which he knows to be false, in order that the same may be used as true, or knowing that the same is likely to be used as true, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to one year, or with fine, or with both.)
  S. 121A (. 121. Waging, or attempting to wage war, or abetting waging of war, against the Government of India.—Whoever, wages war against the [Government of India], or attempts to wage such war, or abets the waging of such war, shall be punished with death, or [imprisonment for life] [and shall also be liable to fine].)
Shut up dude cant you see it's legit? The printed stamp says NATIONAL LOTTERY on it 3 times. 3 times!
Yahan bhi 2nd aaya... Sharmaji ka beta Kia car le gaeya.

This is fake. Meesho parent company is Fashnear technology. On all letterheads, they don’t use the word “Meesho”. 

Also, if you scratch you might get a QR code. Never scan that code or provide info in on any website.
Omg😱... I should have paid attention 😱
